args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- For any complex number z, the modulus of cos z is at least the modulus of cos (Re z). -/
theorem abs_cos_ge_abs_cos_re (z : ℂ) : Complex.abs (Complex.cos z) ≥ Real.abs (Real.cos z.re) := by sorry
